sentences.en: Another group was dissecting a new film showing locally.
sentences.cn: 另外一批人正在剖析城里上演的一部新电影.

sentences.en: I live locally, so it’s easy to get to the office.
sentences.cn: 我就住在附近，所以上班很方便。

sentences.en: Locally dolomite and anhydrite are important as cements.
sentences.cn: 局部地方白云石和硬石膏也是重要的胶结物.

sentences.en: Locally, the coast is bordered by lofty mountains.
sentences.cn: 在个别地区, 海岸是以高耸的山脉为界的.

sentences.en: Most of the country will be dry, but there may be some rain locally.
sentences.cn: 国内大部分地方将是干燥天气, 但局部地区可能下点雨.

sentences.en: Most of the workers will be recruited locally.
sentences.cn: 大多数工人都会在本地招募.

sentences.en: New industries demanded skilled labour not available locally.
sentences.cn: 新行业所需的技术工人在当地是找不到的。

sentences.en: Ski equipment can be hired locally.
sentences.cn: 滑雪器材可以到当地租用.

sentences.en: The aquifer is unconfined locally and may be recharged.
sentences.cn: 含水层因为局部不承压而得到补给.

sentences.en: The curriculum was to be decided locally.
sentences.cn: 课程安排将由地方决定。

sentences.en: The dumping of foreign cotton blocked outlets for locally grown cotton.
sentences.cn: 外国棉花的倾销阻滞了当地生产的棉花的销路.

sentences.en: The hospital may restrict bookings to people living locally.
sentences.cn: 这家医院可能会限定只有当地居民才能预约。

sentences.en: The little restaurant is known to all locally.
sentences.cn: 这家小餐馆在当地远近闻名.

sentences.en: Thin layers of sandy shale, and carbonaceous fragments are locally present.
sentences.cn: 局部出现砂质页岩薄层和碳质碎屑.

sentences.en: This is all locally grown produce.
We've got cards which are drawn and printed and designed by someone locally.
sentences.cn: 我们买了一些当地人绘画、印制和设计的明信片。

words.tran_cn: 当地的；局部的；地方性的；乡土的
局部的；地区的；小范围的
[计] 局部；当地居民；本地新闻
使地方化；定位；局限（localise的过去分词）
使地方化；使局部化；停留在一地方

trans.tran_cn: 在附近，在本地，当地地，本地地
trans.tran_en: in or near the area where you are, or the area you are talking about
